patthana21.24:1.1: Nanahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana21.24:2.1: Nanahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana21.24:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena
patthana21.24:3.1_1: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ nanevadassanena
patthana21.24:3.1_2: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko
patthana21.24:4.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
